about_the_game:
Nothing will ever be the same.

Fallen Hero: Revelations is an interactive superhero novel currently under development by Malin Rydén. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

With the ground cracking under your feet, it is time to step up and take charge of your destiny. Gather your allies and wreak vengeance on your enemies, but first you need to get out of your current predicament. Letting others in on your plans might be necessary, but who can you trust? Who might betray you if they knew what is truly going on? Juggling Rangers and villains may be complicated, but at this point you have little choice. You can’t do this alone. Or can you? Your telepathic powers are growing, but with that comes new dangers. The Heartbreak Site is calling, but is it wise to answer? Do you even have a choice? Burying your past only works if it stays put.

  • Explore romantic, or platonic; polyamorous or exclusive relationships as bisexual, straight, gay, or asexual.
  • Explore relationships as straight, gay, bisexual, or asexual.
  • Recruit more villains to further your goals: a medic turned air-pirate, and a pigeon-shapeshifter thief.
  • Deal with the fallout from four separate endings and get your plans back on track.
  • Play as male, female, genderqueer, or explore your changing gender identity in game.
  • Investigate your connection with the kingpin of Los Diablos —or wreck their house and career.
  • Deepen your previous relationships, mend bridges or burn them, or kindle something new with your new recruits.
  • Solve the mystery of your puppet body before it is too late to banish the ghosts of your past.

And remember, Charge’s 40th birthday is coming up. It would be a shame to miss it.
